DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine if an education program about hygiene and child feeding practices, taught by local village community health workers, will improve child growth and decrease the prevalence of childhood malnutrition in a rural region of Kenya.
DOC.brief_title: A Nutrition/Hygiene Education Program for the Prevention of Child Malnutrition in Rural Kenya
DOC.criteria: Child of a mother living in the catchment area of the study who delivered during the enrollment period
